name: Anarchy
flavor_text: "Stick to wall, ground, human… then FFFFFRRRRRYYYYY! Hehehehehehehe." —Siviks, Lost to None

frame.name: Arc Traps
frame.description: Grenades stick to surfaces and chain Arc bolts to other mines.

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: High-Velocity Rounds

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target

perks.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Composite Stock
